Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 128th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Injured on 4/14/2015 with a Broken Ribs, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 8/7/2016 with a Broken Hip, out for full season...
Injured on 7/26/2018 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2019, off Richard Dagostino (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2019, off Richard Dagostino (STL)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2019, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 6/29/2019 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Colorado on 5/1/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Injured on 5/22/2021 with a Pulled Achilles Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,812,857 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Colorado on 2/6/2022 (Going to COL: SS Hilton Topp, 3B Edward Okeefe, P Carl Sadahige. Going to CIN: 1B Randy Cole, P Lenny Garrett)...
